name: Zombie Santa
description:
Top-down shooter created in a casual 72-hours game jam using Unity.

Santa has been zombified and you play as Mrs.Claus and fight your way to Zombie Santa to clean up this mess. Clear the first map of enemies to reach Zombie Santa and then face the Big Red (and green) Man himself.

Credits:

Winston Liang - Artist, Game Designer and Game Jam Host

Nina Volkmuth - Programmer

Emerson Sridhar - Programmer and Level Designer
